p: Lung viral loads were assessed via MDCK cell culture (all groups) ( Figure 3E,F). The virus was detected in lungs via TCID 50 assay on day 3 for all infected mice ( Figure 3F). On day 6, the virus was only detected in unvaccinated mice ( Figure 3F). In the vaccinated and B/2017-MA infected group, it was noted that only 10â€“20% of cells in the walls were affected, but a 100% cytopathic effect was detected in the comparison group ( Figure 3F).
